Trigger.Name: 80script
Trigger.Description: This should be the sequence of keypresses to confirm your recipe, and to activate your 1st crafting macro.

Action.DiscordWebhookMessage: <@244384166878248961> lost syrup, and I think <@244384166878248961> crafted ${var:ItemN} times ${var:ItemN2}.
Action.UseTTSTextExpression: food finished ending craft ${var:ReuseFoodN} food used

Trigger.Name: 1z quick Fire
Trigger.Description: This should be the sequence of keypresses to confirm your recipe, and to activate your 1st crafting macro.

Trigger.Name: 1b Continue crafting to macro 2
Trigger.Description: This should be the keypress to activate your 2nd crafting macro.

Trigger.Name: 1c Continue crafting to macro 3
Trigger.Description: This should be the keypress to activate your 2nd crafting macro.

Trigger.Name: 9 No mat/inventory
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^.{15}00:[^:]+:Unable to craft\. (?<Unable2>Insufficient inventory space|You do not have the required materials|You have not selected all of the materials)

ConditionSingle.ExpressionR: You do not have the required materials
You have not selected all of the materials

Trigger.Name: 9 Durability 00:0839
Trigger.RegularExpression: (?<Thing>^.{15}00:[^:]+:The condition of your(?<GearName>.*) (?<Durability>has dropped to 10|is now 0))

Action.UseTTSTextExpression: food finished ending craft ${var:ReuseFoodN} food re-used

Action.DiscordWebhookMessage: <@${tvar:basic[2][12]}> reused Food ${var:ReuseFoodN} times, and I think <@${tvar:basic[2][12]}> crafted ${var:ItemN} times ${var:ItemN2}.
Action.UseTTSTextExpression: food finished ending craft ${var:ReuseFoodN} food used

Trigger.Name: 1a fire 1st macro
Trigger.Description: This should be the sequence of keypresses to confirm your recipe, and to activate your 1st crafting macro.
